desc.value: Throwing grenades by hand only gets you so far. If you have any ambition in life, you need a bazooka.
When professionals need to keep a little bit of distance between them and their target, they use reliable tools, rather than flashy ones.
Swords can be optimized for cutting through bones and flesh.
Long rifles are perfect to keep a safe distance from the target.
With the right tools, one can really benefit from sneak attacks and weaknesses in their opponent's armour.
This red fluid is not blood. Not exactly. But it does go into one's veins.
Developing a healthy competitive spirit towards the opponents can lead to some excess, but it helps when hacking each other to bits is in order.
Attacking the same enemy carefully from two sides makes it difficult for them to react, without causing friendly fire.
Semi-automatic weapons use the excess energy of a discharge to load the next bullet in the chamber, allowing the user to fire again immediately.
While it's usually not recommended by the manufacturer, loading a weapon with oversized ammunition can have spectacular results.
Shooting large birds out of the sky is so satisfying. This weapon is optimized to find a flailing target in a clear sky.
This ammo vibrates strongly in subsonic frequencies, creating waves of turbulence breaking the delicate equipment of most flying vessels.
A specific mix of chemical compounds increases the damaging potential of the [!C_Special] even further.
White phosphorus incorporated into the burning mix of the [!C_Special] is responsible for many particularly agonizing deaths, even after the battle is over.
Sardaukars' sense of duty shines brighter on major battlefronts, when they are surrounded by many supporting levies.
When pursuing an enemy, tiring them down is easier than being fast.
With the right tools, the most sturdy tin can can be opened.
A concentrated toxic gas will dissipate in the open, but for the person right next to it, it won't matter much.
Some psychoactive drugs makes people re-live their most painful traumas. It's especially unpleasant when those memories are actually happening at the same time.
Sometimes, it's better to cause pain than actual harm. As always, the [!S_Demo] has the right chemical for the job.
An incredibly precise recursive lens is only really useful if the enemy doesn't move too much.
This ammo keeps accelerating during its flight. Ideal to hit very far targets.
This ammo releases a burning compound into the air upon contact.
This ammo breaks the ground and propagates a powerful seismic wave, damaging anything in a large area.
A clean weapon is the mark of a true gentleman. It's also a sensible way to make it function better.
I will never let fear stop my arm!
I will always dedicate my entire being to my goals!
I will surpass myself, to reach my full potential!
I will never belittle the people I serve!
A cluster of small grenades that detach at the height of the throw will cover more area, while remaining as destructive.
Adding small bits of metal all around the grenades will naturally produce shrapnel that stays inside the body and causes constant pain and bleeding.
Having a spare canon already loaded will make the first few rounds of combat a lot more impactful.
[!F_Elite]s are trained to operate on their own, without any outside assistance when needed.
Hitting with resolve and strength will make most close formations panic and make mistakes.
[!V_Soldier]s are constantly improving the machines surrounding them, if they are provided with some basic tools.
A closed full-body armor increases the odds of survival in combat significantly, at the cost of reduced swiftness.
Faith in the Maker keeps the [Fremen] strong in adversity.
Supporting your brother-in-arms on the front line is key to surviving many fights.
When you cannot rely on shields anymore, older parrying apparatus come back in fashion.
An array of strong lights flashing randomly makes it very unpleasant to fire on a target, or anything close from it.
Holographic technology cannot offer true protection, but it can direct image distortions to make targeting more difficult.
Protecting each other during retreat and maneuvering saves lives and helps to get reinforcements sooner.
If you don't care about severely limiting the wearer's movements, it's easy to build a solid armor.
Using fresh corpses as protection is a skill that requires specialized equipment.
While they constitute most of the imperial army, conscripts are often thought as supporting levy to the powerful Sardaukar.
When the battle seems lost, you can still slow the enemies as much as possible by refusing to die.
The right drug cocktail can be used to completely prevent death... for a very short amount of time.
Taking from the dead might not be pretty, but it is a good survival strategy.
The terrible helmet of the [C_Special] is adorned with reminders of the suffering they inflict.
Being able to reshuffle conscript formations at the front to optimize pressure on the enemy is one of the most impressive features of the imperial army.
The squire's first duty is to protect any noble [!E_Elite] in the vicinity.
Sometimes, the only way to fulfill the protector's duty is to make him a target.
Technology has evolved, but the basic need of protecting oneself while advancing towards combat has remained the same.
A proper [!E_Trooper] should never allow himself to get too excited. He must always keep his head cool in the face of duty.
Fremen [!F_Trooper]s use the sand to make themselves harder to target at range.
In a war, soldiers generally prefer to keep their friends on one side and their enemies on the other, which is not always easy with slippery opponents.
Knowing all the good cover spots helps with the guerilla style of the Fremen army.
A quiet and safe environement is often mandatory to fulfill engineering work peacefully.
[Fremen] are experts at staying unseen in the desert. Even a kulon can be hidden at the right place.
It is easy to hide without moving, but remaining hidden in movement on a planet like Arrakis... That's a proper challenge.
Field experience is essential, but a good theoretical framework for warfare also improves performance.
Even a short initiation to prana bindu training improves healing and pain resistance over time.
A clothing technology inspired by the way scarring tissue are created can be used to make self-repairing armor.
The body naturally produces all kind of hormones when it is hurt. Giving it a little boost is enough to reach almost superhuman capability.
Smaller formations allow faster reactions to unexpected changes of plan and a tailored micro-management of the frontline.
Flamethrowers come in many different shapes and sizes. This nozzle has an unusual wide flow.
With controlled amount of elacca drug carefully injected into their veins, the [!H_Soldier] loses all sense of self-preservation without suffering any numbing.
Equipping every soldier with basic disinfectants, painkillers and wound dressing tools let them keep fighting for longer.
A less viscous blood increases oxygenation, leading to a nice sense of euphoria, but you better not cut yourself.
Sand is notoriously unstable. These shoes are designed to let the wearer run on sand even faster than they would on dirt.
The Sardaukar's reputation as remorseless and efficient killers is the main political asset of the Emperor.
A boot reinforcing the calf muscles of its wearer would permit jumps of incredible length.
The Fremen can train themselves to resist even better in the dry desert.
A sonic grenade might seem like a joke, but it will destabilize the most hardened veteran.
When you remain focused on the task at hand, nothing can slow you down.
A light frame that can be folded in seconds will improve drastically the installation time of most appliance.
A precise scanner looking for differences in heat, air pressure, and visual movement will detect most attempt at concealement.
The [!F_Special_2] is equipped to stay hidden in the same place and disable any passerby aircraft.
A small piece of electronic is enough to scramble most of radio communication to a drone making it a lot harder to pilot.
Memory is an aspect of humanity that could easily be improved with machines.
[!V_Soldier]s are used to taking care of their own needs, but they have to start with some basic resources.
[!V_Elite]s often take care of the regular maintenance of drones on the battlefield, but they need the right parts to do it properly.
These long cannons increase the range of the drone, but also the size of their blind spot.
Lining the inside of a drone with incendiary bombs that trigger on death is an easy way to bring fear to the enemy.
With the proper equipment, the [H_Drone] can really strike a nerve in its opponent.
Applying some of the [!A_Frigate] adaptive technology to the [!A_Drone] makes it more versatile on the field.
The [!A_Drone] makes its presence known with blasting sounds, emboldening [Atreides-adjective] soldiers in the vicinity.
An expensive but powerful engine can be the difference between life and death in an emergency.
By carefully utilizing all space inside the [!A_Drone], it's possible to increase its capacity, but the energy cost is significant.
With a good amount of optical fibers and a big battery, anything can disappear.
Learning from what remains of a wreck is a difficult skill, that can be made easier by designing a drone for it.
Looted artifacts of less sturdy composition could give us a lot of insight on the enemy if they survived the trip.
When you're doing well, everyone should know and wealth should be shared, so that they're motivated to do even better.
Most of the armor and gear you find on a battlefield is too damaged to use, but it's possible to fix it up just enough for one last time.
A mesmerizing light show can easily make anyone forget the rest of the world.
In a conditioned mind, the simple view of certain colors and shapes can incentivize a specific behavior.
There is no down time for the diligent salesman. It's always the right time to sell your product.
Sometimes, you just want to send a big message.
Identifying the target's weakness lets the [!V_Trooper] select the right weapons for the task.
A heavier frame and shielding resists shocks better.
Organic entities generally have hidden weaknesses based on their evolved internal organization.
Encrypting strategic combat data in the electrostatic cloud around the [!V_Drone] enhances the fighting prowess of any drone at range.
Adaptative lens and custom data processors improve the extraction of useful knowledge from combat analysis.
High-energy magnets improve the speed of railgun's projectiles even further.
A miniaturized version of the neural node can be integrated into bigger drones to increase the range of the network.
By applying various fractal frequencies to the Holtzman Coil, its electrostatic field becomes even more lethal.
Loose energy from the electrostatic field can be harnessed and fed back into the Holtzman Coil to improve its resistance.
Painting the bottom of an aircraft in blue is a simple way to make it disappear.
Catching the pieces and bits as they fall is a matter of great skill.
Keeping a well-stocked reserve of scrap metal and tools on board allows for a speedy recovery on the go.
A flying representation of the [Fremen-shortname]'s hopes for a freed Arrakis.
Going with the flow instead of fighting it is the key to surviving the storms of Arrakis.
With a rotating crew of lookouts, equipped with powerful spyglasses, it's easy to survey a large territory from the sky.
In the desert, any strong wind immediatly raises a large murky cloud of sand.
A large hold lets the [!F_Frigate] bring supplies directly to the front.
Longer cannons are enough to increase precision at long range, but it comes at the prize of a lower projectile velocity.
Better tools, and a larger selection of drugs and medicines tremendously increases the efficiency of [!A_Drone]s.
Trained medics in every squadron improves recovery, even behind enemy lines.
Impregnating weapons with caustic and poisonous compounds will contaminate enemy supplies.
The [!A_Drone] can be reconfigured to assume a more active role in combat.
Wielding two sword leads to a more aggressive posture. It's also quite impressive.
Gatling guns shoot small-caliber bullets at a demented speed, shredding less armored units to pieces.
Handguns can be used to attack unreachable targets without interfering with melee combat.
Swords can be optimized for cutting through bones and flesh, but they are less balanced and will be less practical against a fresh foe.
These short-range rifles have a powerful kick.
High-end piercing ammunitions are costly but deadly.
These volatile compounds burn stronger but cannot be safely contained.
With minutiae improvements to their combustible pumps, flamethrowers fire even further away.
High-quality bombs produce a shockwave that shatters armor.
These miniature generators of electromagnetic pulse built into a bullet casing fry electrical components at the cost of reduced penetration.
Adding a mix of phosphorus and other chemical compounds makes the combustible abrasive to skin and electronics alike.
[Fremen] use various specialized gear to ambush their opponents and get an edge in combat.
Combat visors projecting strategic data in real time improve the units' awareness of their surroundings.
Nanoblades are so sharp that they cannot be held in a sheath. They also have a reduced parry surface.
A weapon specially made to cut through armor will not be as good for cutting flesh.
Shells that project small metal splinters in all directions are very effective against infantry.
The effect of surprise is often decisive in an evenly matched fight.
These new viscous combustibles stick to their victims while burning, resulting in gruesome wounds.
A good blacksmith with good materials can forge hardened swords with an incredible edge.
A well-adjusted uniform with a few more layers of armour in the right places can do a lot for survival in combat.
The right food supplements can increase pain tolerance to superhuman levels.
If the worst happens, a magnetic beacon hidden in the stillsuit, lets the clan recover Water and valuables.
With a proper stimulant, one can drastically reduce the time lost to sleeping. Surely, the side effects are not that big of a deal.
A device monitoring the health of the soldier is connected to an armor that can seal itself and deliver first care, preserving the life of its wearer.
Even light armor will impede sneaking abilities.
Padded armor and hulls help dissipate kinetic and thermal energy from explosive and incendiary weapons.
Salvaging is an art form that few people really master. While not as durable as a proper breastplate, a salvaged piece of armour can still save life in a hurry.
Greed is a sin, they say. Maybe the real sin is to let perfectly good weapons and gear to rot in the desert.
A drone replacing some of its weaponry with scopes and lenses will provide valuable [Intel] to its pilot.
Drone and turret weaponry is a question of balance between raw power and practicality. You can always equip them with a bigger gun, but you'll have to lose weight somewhere else.
Costly alloys that absorb impacts instead of breaking can be a worthy investement for mechanical warfare.
Focusing armour on critical points improves durability.
